course_title: Variable Topics Seminar: Advanced Game Theory
class_notes: This course is the second in the formal theory sequence offered in the political science department. The class builds on introductory game theory by applying the solution concepts learned in the introductory course to more complicated games. The course will address many topics, including (but not limited to): bargaining, principal-agent relationships, and signaling games.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 6158, Section #: 5, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: J. Patty, Status: Closed
